Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

Northbound #172 buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Racine
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Halsted, Taylor, Racine then normal route, due to a street blockage near Harrison/Racine

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Halsted, Taylor, Racine then resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Harrison/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Irving Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to police activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#53 Pulaski

#56 Milwaukee

#80 Irving Park

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Jefferson Park to UIC/Halsted; southbound only.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
